languages.text: "Механизм когнитивной реконструкции запущен. Память пробуждается в тебе". {n}Медный шепот заходится в надрывном кашле, а затем свирепо выкрикивает:{/n} "Вспоминай!"
"Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"
languages.original_text: "Механизм когнитивной реконструкции запущен. Память пробуждается в тебе". {n}Медный шепот заходится в надрывном кашле, а затем свирепо выкрикивает:{/n} "Вспоминай!"

traits.locale_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by violent coughing fit. Then she shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「認識復元メカニズムが作動した。あなたの中にある記憶が目覚める」{n}ブラスウィスパーは激しい咳の発作に身体を震わせると、凶暴な叫び声を上げる。{/n}「思い出せ！」
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: 「認識復元メカニズムが作動した。あなたの中にある記憶が目覚める」{n}ブラスウィスパーは激しい咳の発作に身体を震わせると、凶暴な叫び声を上げる。{/n}「思い出せ！」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “认知重建机制已激活，记忆正在你体内苏醒。”{n}铜语剧烈地咳嗽了一声，浑身发抖。随后，他恶狠狠地喊道。{/n}“牢牢记住！”
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: “认知重建机制已激活，记忆正在你体内苏醒。”{n}铜语剧烈地咳嗽了一声，浑身发抖，然后她恶狠狠地喊道。{/n}“牢牢记住！”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Mécanisme de reconstruction cognitive activé. Le souvenir en vous s'éveille. » {n}Murmecuivre est pris d'une violente quinte de toux, mais parvient néanmoins à crier :{/n} « Souvenez-vous ! »
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: « Mécanisme de reconstruction cognitive activé. Le souvenir en vous s'éveille. » {n}Murmecuivre est prise d'une violente quinte de toux, mais parvient néanmoins à crier :{/n} « Souvenez-vous ! »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Mecanismo de reconstrucción cognitiva activado. El recuerdo está despertando en ti». {n}Susurro de latón sufre un fuerte ataque de tos y luego grita ferozmente:{/n} «¡Recuerda!».
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: «Mecanismo de reconstrucción cognitiva activado. El recuerdo está despertando en ti». {n}Susurro de latón sufre un fuerte ataque de tos y luego grita ferozmente:{/n} «¡Recuerda!».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Kognitiver Rekonstruktionsmechanismus aktiviert. Das Gedächtnis erwacht in Euch." {n}Messingflüsterer bekommt einen heftigen Hustenanfall, dann ruft er wild:{/n} "Erinnert Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: "Kognitiver Rekonstruktionsmechanismus aktiviert. Das Gedächtnis erwacht in Euch." {n}Messingflüsterer bekommt einen heftigen Hustenanfall, dann ruft sie wild:{/n} "Erinnert Euch!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Bilişsel rekonstrüksiyon mekanizması devreye sokuldu. İçindeki hafıza uyanıyor." {n}Pirinçfısıltı, şiddetli bir öksürük kriziyle sarsılıp ardından hiddetle haykırıyor.{/n} "Hatırla!"
languages.original_text: "Cognitive reconstruction mechanism activated. The memory is awakening inside you." {n}Brasswhisper is shaken by a violent coughing fit, then he shouts ferociously,{/n} "Remember!"

traits.locale_text: "Bilişsel rekonstrüksiyon mekanizması devreye sokuldu. İçindeki hafıza uyanıyor." {n}Pirinçfısıltı şiddetli bir öksürük kriziyle sarsılıyor, ardından hiddetle haykırıyor:{/n} "Hatırla!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
